doc.title: La raulito en libertad
doc.plot: A young lady nicknamed La Raulito is flown from Buenos Aires, Argentina to Madrid to be the actress in an interview type film. She has an interesting story having been a psychiatric patient for many years. The film is about her answering questions and thus describing her life. She is accompanied by two other ladies who do not really care about her. At first all goes well, but soon Raulito starts feeling pressured by her new career.
